author: Rail Settlement Plan (RSP) / Association of Train Operating Companies (ATOC)

resources.name: Instructions for use of the data (from RPS)

name: uk-rail-timetables
notes:
"contains all national rail passenger train services, associated shipping and bus links, as well as reference data to support timetable enquiry systems. It does not include real time train running information."

Once registered, it allows downloading a zipped up timetable (approx 40Mb) for the current week and previous weeks (commencing 14 Jan 2012).

Dataset created and owned by Rail Settlement Plan Ltd (RSP) which is a division of the Association of Train Operating Companies (ATOC)
<http://www.atoc.org/about-atoc/rail-settlement-plan>

"RSP reserve the right to charge for this timetable data and any other data that may be offered through this website in the future."

Data files included:

*   Full Timetable File - This contains details of all national rail passenger train services, associated shipping and bus links in a CIF format and is supplemented with passenger train service identifiers.
*   Manual Trains File - This file contains data for trains, buses and ferries not held in the Full Timetable File and is also supplied in CIF format, but does not include train service identifiers. This file is commonly known as the “Z Trains File”.
*   Master Stations Names File - This file stores all location specific data that is relevant to systems using the Full Timetable File.
*   Fixed Link File - This file contains details of walking times, bus, tube and Metro links between stations for which timetabled services are not shown in the Full Timetable File."
title: UK Rail Timetables
